string-array.name: character_descriptions
string-array.item: A cheerful and optimistic sea sponge who loves jellyfishing and working as a fry cook at the Krusty Krab.
SpongeBobs dim-witted but lovable starfish best friend who enjoys eating and relaxing under his rock.
A grouchy, artistic octopus who dreams of fame as a clarinet player but is stuck as a cashier at the Krusty Krab.
The greedy and eccentric crab who owns the Krusty Krab and is obsessed with making money.
SpongeBobs intelligent pet snail, known for his cat-like meowing and calm demeanor.
A tiny yet ambitious plankton constantly plotting to steal the Krabby Patty secret formula.
A smart and adventurous squirrel from Texas, skilled in karate and science, who lives in an air-filled dome underwater
A pufferfish and SpongeBobs long-suffering boating school teacher, who dreads his chaotic driving lessons.
Mr. Krabs teenage whale daughter, who loves shopping, cheerleading, and living the life of a typical teenager.
Planktons sarcastic computer wife who often provides plans and advice for his schemes.
